metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34033 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HTMLDoc v1.9.15 was discovered to contain a heap overflow via (write_header) /htmldoc/htmldoc/html.cxx:273.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.16-1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.16-1').
